attributes.description:
The competition has no answer for this trend setter, 
Infotainment system, rear view camera, multi-function steering wheel, 
Air conditioner, Electric Windows, Radio, AUX, Bluetooth, 
Air Bags, Side Impact Protection,

Security System, Immobiliser, Power Steering, Impact Tensioning Seat Belts, Brakes, abs, ebd,
